mapper.select: select from TSSO_USER_ROLE ORDER by BIND_ORDER_NUM DESC
select case when max(BIND_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(BIND_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TSSO_USER_ROLE

select * from TSSO_USER_ROLE where BIND_ORDER_NUM = (select max(BIND_ORDER_NUM) from TSSO_USER_ROLE where BIND_ORDER_NUM<(select BIND_ORDER_NUM from TSSO_USER_ROLE where BIND_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))

select * from TSSO_USER_ROLE where BIND_ORDER_NUM = (select min(BIND_ORDER_NUM) from TSSO_USER_ROLE where BIND_ORDER_NUM>(select BIND_ORDER_NUM from TSSO_USER_ROLE where BIND_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select count(BIND_ID) from TSSO_USER_ROLE where BIND_ROLE_ID=#{roleId} and BIND_USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from TSSO_USER_ROLE where BIND_ROLE_ID=#{roleId} and BIND_USER_ID=#{userId}
